errors.noMatch: error: this is not a telegram bot token...
errors.failedCreateBot: failed to connect to the bot...
errors.noBusiness: business mode is not enabled for this bot. instructions on how to enable it can be found at the link below.
errors.noInline: inline mode is not enabled for this bot. instructions on how to enable it can be found at the link below.
errors.tooManyBots: you have too many bots. please remove the unnecessary ones.
errors.botExists: this bot has already been registered!

start.message: hi, {{.Name}}! click the "open instruction" button to see how to connect your bot. important! you need to enable "business mode" in your bot optional: "inline mode", "inline feedback"

handleToken: the bot @{{.Username}} has been successfully connected to our system.
